snippet: The Joint Commission on Public Ethics said Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s girlfriend, Sandra Lee, his children and their friends could ride along with him on official aircraft without reimbursement.
abstract: New York State Joint Commission on Public Ethics says Gov Andrew M Cuomo's longtime girlfriend Sandra Lee can ride along with him on state aircraft without reimbursement.
lead_paragraph: The Joint Commission on Public Ethics said Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s girlfriend, Sandra Lee, his children and their friends could ride along with him on official aircraft without reimbursement.

headline.seo: Cuomo Cleared to Take Sandra Lee on State Aircraft
headline.main: Cuomo Cleared to Bring Girlfriend When He Rides State Planes
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Cleared to Bring Girlfriend When He Rides State Planes
